column5: hi. of the 8 lodges on lake tobin how would you rate them. I know from past experience that the new person to the lodge generally gets the worst cabin or the cabin in the worst spot. its just the wife and i so it would be a cabin for 2.

WOW! There are 8 lodges, now? Woof...I can remember when there was one...Tobin Lake resort. Sorry, I can't help you much. We have been staying strictly at MacSwaney's for our fall trips the past 10 years or so....because we just fish the river in fall. In summer I'd want to be closer to the lake, myself.
